services.title: Service 1
services.description: Small pencil portraits (includes pets) 5"x7" to 8"x10". Background elements = extra charge. I do not offer larger sizes in this service at this time.

services.description: Small watercolor/gouache portraits (includes pets) 5"x7" to 8"x10". Background elements = extra charge. I do not offer larger sizes in this service at this time.

services.title: Service 4
services.description:
Small to large scale paintings. I offer only acrylic paintings in this service at this time. Message
me or email @SkyleeLPerkins@gmail.com to inquire about price,
duration, and subject matter.

services.title: Service 5
services.description: Digital line work only (Tattoo designs) Discussion of size, intricacy, and placement is required.
